- Use repository UI files (components, styles) as context.
- Accepts screenshots or DOM snapshots if available.

- PR title, PR description, changed UI files, diff

- Accessibility (WCAG) issues
- Responsiveness concerns
- Visual consistency issues

- New user:
- Accessibility-first:
- Performance-sensitive:
- Low-power devices:

- Short actionable item bullets with file refs
